root.message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 13-a-1, translated into en
root.data:
• UNFCCC biennial reporting guidelines for developed country Parties, Annex I: Decision 2/CP.17
  • Biennial Reports Common tabular format (CTF) for “UNFCCC biennial reporting guidelines for developed country Parties”: Decision 19/CP.18
  • Biennial Reports by Annex I Parties to be submitted until 2022: https://unfccc.int/BRs, and Biennial Transparency Reports by developed as well as developing country Parties to be reported under Paris Agreement from 2024 onwards: https://unfccc.int/process-and-meetings/transparency-and-reporting/reporting-and-review-under-the-paris-agreement
  • Compilation and synthesis of the fourth Biennial Reports (BR4): https://unfccc.int/CandS-report-2020
  • Biennial Assessment and Overview of Climate Finance Flows is a report prepared under the Standing Committee on Finance by the UNFCCC and includes a compilation of the data on financial support provided to developing countries by Annex I Parties. Each Party reports climate-specific finance provided and the underlying assumption and methodologies used: https://unfccc.int/topics/climate-finance/resources/biennial-assessment-of-climate-finance.
  • Statement by 18 Donor States Determined to Commit USD100 Billion for Climate Finance: https://unfccc.int/news/18-industrial-states-release-climate-finance-statement
